reviews.review: This was a different kind of Avenger Movie... it mad me sad. I know there is a great lead from this movie... there must be. This was very entertaining and way full of energy. Just not what I was expecting. Gotta put it to ya Marvel this one was certainly a surprise. I cannot wait to see what you have up your sleeve for the next Avenger Movie. Unexpected but Yes!!! Still 5 Stars... and sad (very emotional ending guy's).
Good movie, but the plot line was predictable.

Just overrated movie with so many plot holes.
Ruso Brother just made a typical Acton movie
I don't cry at many movies, but even I shed tears while watching this movie. This is my favorite movie!
This was great. I haven't seen the previous movies, so I had better see them before the next one comes out. I really enjoyed this.

The Russo's have masterfully created a super hero film that has creatively intertwined 10 years of world building into a 2 hours thrill ride that left many in Awe.  A movie has never benefited more from a second watch then this one. It is going to be a long year.

Amazing, just amazing. Avengers infinity war has so many super hero's and still evenly splits screen time between them all. The movies main villain Thanos is probably one of my favourite movie villains of all time, he doesn't just want to kill half the life in the universe because he's a villain, he has a reason and a tragic past that fuels his ambition. When Thanos succeeds and kills half the life in the universe, the scene that fallows is sad and well acted. The fight scenes are legendary (especially the fight on titan).This movie is great and almost perfect.
too much CGI. story was too confusing and difficult to follow without all of the history of competin characters. still entertaining though.
I guess you should be a bit more up to date on the Marvel Universe than I am to rate this but for the movie the action and the story I enjoyed it though I probably didnâ€™t know half the characters.
